September 19, 1969
Mr. Albert L. Hulsen
Director Radio Projects
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
1345 Avenue of the Americas
New York City, New York 1001Â®
Dear Als
In the CPB Newsletter for September, page two, under the title New Sounds
only twenty two stations are listed. I believe the WHOM project is excluded."'
Can you advise me as to the status of their project?
Sincerely
Robert A. *fott
